S

Scene - Class in lw3dge.game
This class represents a Game Scene, including a list of objects, lights, sky-box, and object management methods.

set(long) - Static method in class lw3dge.game.Time

Sets the rendering camera reference
setGlobalLight(Light) - Method in class lw3dge.game.Scene
Sets the global light for this scene
setTexture(ModelTexture) - Method in class lw3dge.graphics.models.TexturedModel

ShaderProgram - Class in lw3dge.graphics.shaders
This class represents a basic ShaderProgram and all abstracted necessities Credit to ThinMatrix and his OpenGL Tutorials
ShaderProgram(String, String) - Constructor for class lw3dge.graphics.shaders.ShaderProgram
Create a ShaderProgram Instance with the defined vertex and fragment shaders.
shineDamper - Variable in class lw3dge.graphics.textures.ModelTexture
A float used in the shader to determine the factor of reflected light that should be absorbed by a camera view.
showCursor() - Static method in class lw3dge.graphics.DisplayManager
A public static method to show the cursor on the display
shutdown() - Static method in class lw3dge.graphics.DisplayManager
A static method to shut down the display
start() - Static method in class lw3dge.graphics.DisplayManager
Initializes the Display and Display Manager.
start() - Method in class lw3dge.graphics.shaders.ShaderProgram

StaticShader - Class in lw3dge.graphics.shaders
A static shader to shade most objects Credit to ThinMatrix and his OpenGL Tutorials
